snippet: The explosion killed one person and damaged the headquarters of the Syrian Arab Red Crescent relief organization, state media reported.
abstract: Car bomb explodes in Damascus, Syria, suburb killing one person and damaging headquarters of Syrian Arab Red Crescent relief organization.

byline.contributor: Hala Droubi contributed reporting from Dubai, United Arab Emirates, and an employee of The New York Times from Damascus, Syria.

lead_paragraph: The explosion killed one person and damaged the headquarters of the Syrian Arab Red Crescent relief organization, state media reported.

headline.seo: Car Bomb Rocks Damascus as Fighting Rages
headline.main: Aid Group Hit by Car Bomb in Damascus
headline.print_headline: Aid Group Hit By Car Bomb In Damascus
